frontmatter.heading: Contract Administration and Audit Services
frontmatter.meta_title: Contract Admin & Audit Services for Agile | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: From monitoring performance to holding contractors accountable, the work required for contract admin and audit of agile software contracts requires a deep understanding of the process. Learn more on the TechFAR Hub.

frontmatter.heading: Technical Evaluation
frontmatter.meta_title: Evaluation of Government Contracts for Agile | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: Conducting evaluation of government contracts for agile is the final stage of the pre-award acquisition lifecycle, but the work starts early in the process. Learn about tips for successful technical and price evaluation on the TechFAR Hub.

frontmatter.heading: How to Use TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.promo_description: using the techfar hub

frontmatter.heading: Agile Overview
frontmatter.meta_title: What is Agile Software Development | TechFAR Hub Handbook | USDS.gov
frontmatter.meta_description: If you are in the planning phase of the acquisition lifecycle, it is a good time to answer the question, what is agile software development? Knowing what you are buying is crucial to successful procurement outcomes.

frontmatter.heading: The Agile Team
frontmatter.meta_title: Cross-Functional Teams in Agile Development | TechFAR Hub Handbook
frontmatter.meta_description: The agile team is a cross-functional assembly of government program, acquisition and technical personnel and contract personnel like designers, engineers, and project managers.

frontmatter.heading: Contract Design
frontmatter.meta_title: Contract Types for Agile Development Contracts | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: There are several contract types available for agile development contracts. Choosing the best one depends on your own circumstances and organizational needs. These TechFAR Hub resources can help your decision making.

frontmatter.heading: Agile Government and The Department of Justice
frontmatter.promo_description: The DOJ modernized a highly decentralized system by demonstrating quick successes while focusing on the end-user experience and stakeholder collaboration. Iterative releases led to a tangible return on investment.

frontmatter.heading: The Acquisition that Helped the Department of Veterans Affairs Modernize Its Claims Appeals System
frontmatter.promo_description: The VA competitively awarded a task order for digital services off of the agency’s Indefinite Delivery Indefinite Quantity (IDIQ) contract vehicle called Transformation Twenty-One Total Technology Next Generation (T4NG). A coding exercise was leveraged as part of the evaluation.

frontmatter.heading: Case Study Challenge - Project RAINBO
frontmatter.promo_description: This case study reflects an scenario that Acquisitions professionals could experience when procuring digital services. It is intended to simulate the conditions faced when acquiring novel technologies.

frontmatter.heading: Case Study Challenge - Small Agency Legacy Application Migration
frontmatter.promo_description: This case study reflects an authentic scenario that Acquisitions professionals could experience when procuring digital services to migrate a legacy on-premise application.

frontmatter.heading: Case Study Challenge - Navigating Stakeholder and Decision-making Challenges
frontmatter.promo_description: This case study reflects an authentic scenario that Acquisitions professionals could experience when procuring digital services. It is intended to simulate the conditions faced when acquiring digital assets and the associated risks and barriers presented by diverse stakeholders with varied personalities and perspectives.

frontmatter.heading: How the Pay.gov Team Went Agile
frontmatter.promo_description: The US Treasury, Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland, is responsible for the Pay.gov system. This involved using a contract that supported Agile Project Management. The following is what happened once that contract was in place.

frontmatter.heading: Case Study Challenge - So, You Want to Replace a Legacy System…
frontmatter.promo_description: This case study reflects an authentic scenario that Acquisitions professionals could experience when procuring digital services to replace an aging, custom-built legacy tool.

frontmatter.heading: The Agile Shift at the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS)
frontmatter.promo_description: Health & Human Services (HHS) adopted Agile methodologies to improve acquisition efficiency, responsiveness, and effectiveness. This case study delves into the multifaceted challenges encountered during this transition.

frontmatter.heading: Salesforce Governmentwide BPA
frontmatter.promo_description: The Salesforce Implementation, Integration and Support Services (SIISS) BPA expired on December 20, 2020. You can find Salesforce implementation and integration support services on the Multiple Award Schedule under IT Professional Services (Special Item Number 54151S

frontmatter.heading: VA dot gov Modernization - Comparative Analysis
frontmatter.promo_description: The VA technology Acquisition Cent, in support of VA OIT/DSVA, utilized FAR 13.1 Simplified Acquisition Procedures, which enabled the team to streamline a multi-step evaluation with onsite demonstrations, and documented the evaluation using a comparative analysis.

frontmatter.heading: Acquisition Innovation Labs & Pilot for Digital Acquisition Innovation Lab
frontmatter.promo_description: This memorandum requests each Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Act agency to ensure it has an acquisition innovation lab, or similar mechanism, in place to help agency programs and their integrated project teams (IPTs) achieve better results for the taxpayer. The memorandum further requests that agencies place emphasis on information technology (IT) investments in their labs, and encourages agencies to consider participation in a pilot to accelerate the development of digital acquisition capabilities within their agencies through hands-on coaching of cross-functional teams.

frontmatter.heading: Federal Source Code Policy
frontmatter.promo_description: This policy seeks to address these challenges by ensuring that new custom-developed Federal source code be made broadly available for reuse across the Federal Government. In acquisition for software solutions, it is important to understand this memo and how it can be applied.

frontmatter.heading: Bringing Additional Software Developers Into the Federal Marketplace
frontmatter.promo_description: The purpose of this memorandum is to help agencies bring additional talented software developers into the Federal Marketplace to supplement existing contractor talent and ensure robust support for projects that call for software development.

frontmatter.heading: Statement of Objectives Template
frontmatter.promo_description:
This template uses the Digital Service Playbook as a foundation for a requirements document. It includes questions for the vendor that they must answer in their quote or proposal that help demonstrate their familiarity with modern digital service delivery. Use this template to help you get started, and make any edits or modifications that you feel are necessary.

At the conclusion of your effort, consider coming back to TechFAR Hub and providing feedback on how well the template worked, what you did to modify it, and what you would recommend to others who wish to use this in their work.

frontmatter.heading: FAI Periodic Table of Acquisition Innovation
frontmatter.promo_description: The Federal Acquisition Institute's Periodic Table of Acquisition Innovations is the government-wide acquisition knowledge management portal for innovative business practices and technologies.

frontmatter.heading: Finding Opportunities and Providing Services to the Federal Government
frontmatter.promo_description: This guide is intended to walk through some of the initial processes required in an effort to reduce the time it takes to bring innovative digital service companies into the government marketplace.

frontmatter.heading: The Procuremenati, Working to Transform the Way that Government Buys IT
frontmatter.promo_description: The USDS procurement team is working to change the FedGov IT buying culture to better support fast changing technologies, increase ROI, and improve outcomes for users.

frontmatter.heading: Modifying Agile Contracts
frontmatter.meta_title: Contract Modifications for Agile and Digital Services | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: Contract modifications for agile development contracts and other digital services are primarily a question of scope. Get answers from the TechFAR Hub.

frontmatter.heading: Price Evaluation
frontmatter.meta_title: Conducting Price Evaluation of Agile Contracts | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: If you are conducting or plan to conduct price evaluation for agile contract proposals, review these TechFAR Hub resources first.

frontmatter.heading: Digital IT Acquisition Professional Training Program (DITAP)
frontmatter.promo_description: This training and development program teaches federal government acquisition professionals to design innovative and flexible procurements for IT/Digital Services, and how to become change ambassadors.

frontmatter.heading: Planning for agile
frontmatter.meta_title: Acquisition Planning for Agile Development | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: These TechFAR Hub resources will help you complete the acquisition planning tasks required to create compliant contracting solutions for agile software development.

frontmatter.heading: Contract Vehicles for Agile
frontmatter.meta_title: Contract Vehicles for Agile Development Contracts | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: Contract vehicles exist to help you streamline your agile development contracts and get access to contractors faster. Learn how to use existing vehicles and propose new ones on the TechFAR Hub.

frontmatter.heading: Department of Veterans (VA) Affairs Mobile Applications Cloud Migration Case Study
frontmatter.promo_description: The VA Technology Acquisition Center, in support of VA OIT and VHA, along with assistance from USDS, utilized a Cloud Migration Technical Demonstration as part of an open market solicitation in order to better evaluate a vendors technical capability.

frontmatter.heading: Agency Maturity for Agile
frontmatter.promo_description: Use this to evaluate and correlate a requiring activities' organizational maturity in adoption of digital service techniques to the resulting contract action.

frontmatter.heading: Glossary
frontmatter.promo_description: The following is a glossary of terms commonly used for Agile Software Development Services. This is not inclusive of all terms.

frontmatter.heading: Sample Language for Government Contracts for Agile Software Development Services
frontmatter.promo_description: This text is to help illustrate how Agile principles may be applied. It is not intended to set new policy or serve as default contract language.

frontmatter.heading: Agile Task Order FFP Independent Government Cost Estimate (IGCE) Template Example
frontmatter.promo_description: When Firm fixed price per iteration is preferred, this template shows you how to create your estimate.

frontmatter.heading: Quick and Dirty Guide to Agile Project Management
frontmatter.promo_description: This summary provides information on the key tenants of agile project management and explains how it can be used to manage digital services projects.

frontmatter.heading: Market Research
frontmatter.meta_title: Market Research for Agile Development Contractors | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: These TechFAR Hub resources will help you conduct market research to learn about agile and discover agile development contractors.

frontmatter.heading: 8(a) Digital Service Initiative
frontmatter.promo_description: The U.S. Digital Service and Small Business Administration have partnered to help agencies buy digital services using this low-risk gateway.

frontmatter.heading: Performance Based Contracting
frontmatter.meta_description: Performance based acquisition and contracting techniques are a great fit for agile software development because they allow the experts to be the experts in delivery!

frontmatter.heading: Veterans Benefits Administration (VBA) Salesforce Center of Excellence, User-Centered Design Challenge
frontmatter.promo_description: The VA Technology Acquisition Center worked with USDS and other VA stakeholders to conduct a user-centered design challenge to award a Task Order on the GSA Salesforce BPA.

frontmatter.heading: UX Contract Principles
frontmatter.promo_description: There are plenty of UX contract principles about IT functionality, but there is a gap when it comes to addressing how well the technology is built for and around humans. Gap filled.

frontmatter.heading: Create an Inspiring Product Vision
frontmatter.promo_description: This field guide is designed to help articulate your agency’s product vision. In order to have an inspiring product vision, project teams must be clear on the problem that they want to solve! Once they are clear they can use the product vision as THE true north to guide the project. It is as the French say, the “raison d’etre” for a project. It is the reason why the entire project exists.

frontmatter.heading: GSA Blog
frontmatter.promo_description: Stay connected with initiatives and events sponsored by the General Services Administration (GSA).

frontmatter.heading: Requirements Development
frontmatter.meta_title: Requirements for Agile Development Contracts | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: Developing requirements for agile software development contracts require a new way of thinking, beyond what you may have experienced in the past. Use these TechFAR Hub resources to learn why agile requirements are unique and special.

frontmatter.heading: How to use an 8(a) company for your digital service needs
frontmatter.promo_description: The use of SBA’s 8(a) program can reduce pressure on agencies to use digital services by shortening procurement lead times, ease competition requirements, and provide coaching around new implementation methods.

frontmatter.heading: 18F Digital Service Blog
frontmatter.promo_description: 18F, an office within the General Services Administration (GSA), share how they help other government agencies build, buy, and share technology products.

frontmatter.heading: Terms and Conditions
frontmatter.meta_title: Terms, Conditions & Clauses for Agile Contracts | TechFAR Hub
frontmatter.meta_description: Learn about terms, conditions and clauses that you should consider for your agile development contracts with these resources from the TechFAR Hub.

frontmatter.heading: History of the Tech Far Hub
Agile Development RFQ Sample
frontmatter.promo_description: Used to award a task order for Firm Fixed Price Agile Software Development support services. Includes a phased source selection process.

frontmatter.heading: Tech Challenge Playbook
frontmatter.promo_description: Learn to use challenges to assess vendors.

frontmatter.heading: U.S. Digital Service Blog
frontmatter.promo_description: The U.S. Digital Service share how applying tech startup processes and methodologies to the Federal government can deliver better services to the American people.

frontmatter.heading: GSA CoE Cloud Migration Acquisition Journey Map
frontmatter.promo_description: This journey map will walk you through the phases of the acquisition lifecycle, and shows roles and resources needed for cloud migration.

frontmatter.heading: SalesForce CRM BPA Call
frontmatter.promo_description: This was used on a multiple award BPA for the purpose of awarding a task order for agile development on a SalesForce CRM project.

frontmatter.heading: Agile Team Estimator
frontmatter.promo_description: This agile team estimator worksheet is a tool to help calculate an Independent Government Cost Estimate (IGCE)

frontmatter.heading: RFQ Design Challenge and Comparative Analysis
frontmatter.promo_description: A RFQ that utilized a comparative analysis, a phased downselect, and a design challenge.

frontmatter.heading: Market Research - Sources Sought Tool
frontmatter.promo_description: Because market research should be more meaningful, and should take less time for both vendors and Government.

frontmatter.heading: Innovation is a Contract Sport
frontmatter.promo_description: The Partnership for Public Service evaluates how and when Federal Agencies are most likely to implement innovation well. Successful examples are contributed to collaborating with nongovernmental partners, managing risk, allowing for failure, and changing agency culture; all values of the US Digital Services Playbook.

frontmatter.heading: Examples of Team Members and Roles Needed to Support Agile Software Development
frontmatter.promo_description: Use this to see team members and roles needed for Agile Software Development.
